article_title: Rite Aid Reports Another Quarter Of Rising Sales In Q2'14

article_metadata.author: Great Speculations

og.description: Rite Aid reported sales for the month of August and Q2 2014 ended August 30, last week. At $2.52 billion and $6.39 billion, total drugstore sales for both August 2014 and Q2 2014, respectively, grew 3.7%. Year-to-date, Rite Aid reported a 3.2% growth in total drugstore sales ($12.91 billion) and a [...]
